DOC.brief_summary: This is a multicenter, randomized, vehicle-controlled, double-blind parallel group study to evaluate the efficacy and safety of CD 2027 Oily Spray applied twice daily for 8 weeks in subjects with plaque-type psoriasis.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety Study of CD 2027 Spray in Subjects With Plaque-type Psoriasis
DOC.criteria: Subject has a diagnosis of plaquetype psoriasis up to 20% of body surface area (BSA) involved excluding the scalp, with a Global Severity Score of at least 3 (moderate) at Screening Subject presents with a representative target lesion that is at least 16 cmÂ² in area, is located on the nonbony areas of the skin, has a Scaling Score up to 2 (moderate), has a DSS of at least 4 Other type of psoriasis (other than plaque) Significant abnormal lab findings Hypercalcemia
